startCard.title: Brand or Organization
startCard.description: If your brand is established and you're looking for continuous support, get started now.

home.title: Create your profile and take the first step towards new opportunities
home.description: By creating your account, you'll gain access to a thriving community where brands and individuals are committed to offering you ongoing support. This support network will empower you with the resources, guidance, and connections you need to succeed, ensuring that you’re never alone on your journey

success.create: Registration successful! Proceeding to next step...
success.update: Registration updated successfully! Proceeding to next step...

error.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
error.server: Server error. Please try again later.

step1.title: Basic Info
step1.subTitle: Tell about your Brand/organization
step1.description: Provide an overview of the brand or organization you want to register on 3F.

validation.name: Brand/Organisation name is required
validation.brandTags: At least one brand tag is required
validation.terms: You must agree to the terms of service

mission.title: What is the primary mission or objective of your brand/organization?
mission.description: Be more specific about it, as it will be published as your deck on the 3F(150-300 characters). read more

social.title: Help your contributors find you faster (at least 3 options)
social.description: Connect your socials so the contributors get to know you better and find you faster.

defaultContent.summaryText1: Introduce yourself, your team(if you have) and your background.
defaultContent.summaryText2: Briefly describe about the long term and short term goal of your brand and why it is important to you.
defaultContent.impactText1: Share more about your brand and highlight how contributions can make a meaningful impact
defaultContent.impactText2: Explain why your brand is important to contributors and how it positively influences the world.
defaultContent.impactText3: Showcase your brand is proven success and past achievements, if applicable
defaultContent.impactText4: Help people connect with your brand is mission and build trust by sharing authentic stories and experiences
defaultContent.storyText: Share the vision of your organization and the journey that led to its establishment.

step3.title: Waiting to approve
step3.descripton: You will be notified as soon as it is approved.
step3.info: Your information is under review and will be confirmed within 2 to 5 business days.

step4.title: Congratulation!
step4.descripton: Your Creative Starter has been approved by our experts!
step4.info: Welcome aboard! Let's dive in and get started

updates.title: Updates
updates.sampleText: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. delete.title: Delete Question
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this question? This action cannot be undone.

validation.questionRequired: Question must be at least 20 characters long
validation.answerRequired: Answer must be at least 20 characters long

common.deleteConfirmationMessage: This item will be deleted, are you sure?
